newsitem.title: USA: Nematron releases software development aid.
newsitem.headline: Nematron releases software development aid.

text.p: Nematron Corp said Monday its Imagination Systems Inc division will release a new version of a product that allows software developers to create real-time applications that run under Microsoft Corp's Windows NT operating system.

The company said the so-called Hyperkernel 4.0 software gives developers the chance to integrate real-time applications under standard Windows NT, as opposed to using proprietary operating systems and other tools.
Nematron designs and makes industrial automation products. Its stock was was up 1/4 Monday afternoon at 5-1/2.
